thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 2 of 1898
thread.title: Jackelyn

author: Jackelyn
title: Jackelyn
text: I booked a flight today and when I started it was $335 and 2 minutes later when I was done booking it was $476!!! I think I when you click on a flight it should be reserved at that price while you complete the booking process! Not impressed but was travelling with others who had booked the same morning and wanted to be on the same flight so really had no choice!
